law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 336. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 276. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1379-8, 1380.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Credit allowed on fine when prisoner works -- Work hours -- Release of prisoners.
